One of the gypsies in lavastorm mountains sell these. They're around 25 or
30pp.


Elwyn

Subject: Re: Dragon kit goodies (was:RE: [eqbards] Nagafen 2; Sylly 0)

I assume you are talking about the Earring of Fire Reflection: AC 1, +5 HR?
My question is, what gypsy merchant sells these? I pride my bard on being
a resistance nut, but I have not seen these.

Thanks
